reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater fits well over other shirts and appreciate its quality construction. The cardigan is warm, with one customer noting it's perfect for cool fall days, and they like its style, with one mentioning it's dressy enough for office wear. They praise its length, with one review noting it comes to mid-thigh, and appreciate its weight, being both heavy and not bulky. Customers describe the sweater as

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice versatile high-quality cardigan
items.body: I'm 5â€™11â€, 250 lbs. 52â€ chest, 47â€ waist, 24â€ sleeve. I'm usually about a size 22/24. I ordered the next size up in this shirt, and it fit me very loosely, just like I prefer it. I usually like my sweaters/cardigans slouchy and close to a tunic length, and this sweater fell about 3â€ below my backside. The sleeves were just over the 24â€ length. The torso fit me nicely with just a tad bit of loosenessâ€”enough to hide my belly/waist area without being slouchy. If you're looking to cover your entire tush, this is your cardigan. I was surprised that this material (gray color) wasn't on the thinner side like most sweaters online. It had a much tighter and thicker weave than most cardigand like this. The cardigan also has a more formal or professional look to it that's not super visible in the photographs. I'm pretty satisfied with this purchase. Because of the length, I probably would order it in more colors if they had a bigger variety (camel, light gray, etc). I definitely would recommend for purchase. Read more
items.author: JenCmart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater best purchase
items.body: I like this sweater itâ€™s med weight material of good quality it was worth the money have been wearing everyday since I got it I like it that much size true to size I got black and itâ€™s very pretty mine reaches to my knees and it doesnâ€™t wrinkle Read more
items.author: VALERIE FALGOUT

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great looking, soft, warm sweater
items.body: The sweater is for an upcoming trip to colder climate in January. The sweater fits great over another shirt and there is plenty of arm room. Sleeves are a bit long but look okay when rolled up. Love the pockets. Sweater is longer than most cardigans and comes to mid-thigh. Material is soft to the touch, and heavier than most, but isnâ€™t bulky. Read more
items.author: M. Nelson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm obsessed with my sweater!!
items.body: I've been looking since 2017!! for a new "work sweater" iykyk because its hard to find the perfect loose size, good length, soft texture and black and mid-weight AND I FOUND IT ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ðŸ‘ Thank you for making this true to size, the perfect longer sleeve length and it's not too long of length so it doesn't catch on the chair. The black hasn't faded or pilled, ive washed AND dried it (i know) and it looks the same. I'm buying two more just in case. The price can't be beat for the quality. The sweater is thick, warm but not heavy. Big and tall will appreciate it and fr you'll like it i promise Read more
items.author: Shel

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: It's heavy enough for cold weather Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mid-length sweater
items.body: I bought this sweater around a year and a half ago in gray. I like the material because it holds its shape, not loose like a knit sweater. The length is perfect for me. Iâ€™m 5 ft. 2. I thought I would now try this blue one and maybe the black next. I recommend this sweater. Perfect for spring and fall and as a dressy covering over dress pants. Read more
items.author: sally

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Fit
items.body: I needed a long cardigan sweater to throw over a t-shirt during these Winter months, & I hit the jackpot. The quality is top-notch, & it hangs on my body perfectly. Itâ€™â€™s not flimsy or sticks on my hips in all the wrong places, & it has the perfect amount of weight. It arrived in a flash & I'm very happy with my purchase. Read more
items.author: Lori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black Sweater
items.body: I love the weight of the sweater, and the fit is somewhat big, but I will layer up. I prefer my outer wear to fit larger, than to be tight, so I can have moving room when driving or just sitting. Restaurants and movie theaters are very cold this sweater will be perfect. I will wash it in wool-lite to see what happened, and follow-up. Otherwise I would recommend this sweater if you are looking for a sweater like this to keep you warm at work, or church, or whatever the need may be for. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Black, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
